attributes.action: Boycott Chinese Goods Help yourself out of Recession
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are currently in a monetary depression, we all feel it. And it's a long way out.
 
BUT YOU CAN HELP
 
All our wealth is going to China. 
Every time you buy something made in China you send your money to China, not to your country not to your neighbours but to China the next Country to rule the world. 
Chinese people are not consumer driven like we in the west, so china relies solely on we Americans/Europeans to buy their products.
Sub Prime mortgages were led from the glut of savings, the highest percentage of those savings are Chinese!!
They save We spend we live on plastic/credit for today but they are saving.
It's a country of great disparity of rich and poor.
Inferior goods which reduce the lifespan of products which means we use more valuable earth resources twice as quick.
 

If you buy Chinese you are working toward china ruling us all by the weight of its economy


If you buy Chinese you support:
 

Slave labour
Child Labour
Pollution
Dictatorships
Squandering valuable earth resources
The harvesting of illegal body parts from executed prisoners’
 
 

Money is power keep your money in your area or that of your friends

Buy American 
Buy European

Let’s stand strong together

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
